title: Developing Digital Learning Design Competencies Based on Social Cognitive Neuroscience for Preservice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in foundational instructional design and digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Strengthening learning design competencies specialized for social studies subjects for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement at least three digital learning scenarios applying principles of social cognitive neuroscience.
Learners can improve learner engagement analysis and feedback systems using virtual classroom simulation tools.
Learners can evaluate their lesson design processes and derive improvements using digital tools (e.g., portfolios, AI analysis reports) for reflective practice.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
